mapper.sql: SELECT a.Id, a.UserId, a.AccountName, a.BankName, a.BankId, a.BankNum, a.ApplyMoney, a.PayTime, a.State, a.CreateTime, a.UpdateTime FROM Cashout_Record_t a
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Cashout_Record_t ( UserId, AccountName, BankName, BankId, BankNum, ApplyMoney, PayTime, State, CreateTime, UpdateTime ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{accountName}, #{bankName}, #{bankId}, #{bankNum}, #{applyMoney}, #{payTime}, #{state}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
